name: Linked Chess
description:
Linked Chess was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The theme for the Jam was Joined Together. To fit this theme, this version of chess has pieces linked together.

Game created by Benjamin Humes

Public Domain Chess Piece Icons from OpenGameArt.Org - Chess Pieces and a Board by drummyfish

Public Domain Piece Moving SFX from OpenGameArt.Org - 51 UI sound effects (buttons, switches and clicks) by Kenney.nl

Public Domain Game End SFX from OpenGameArt.Org - 85 Short Music Jingles by Kenney.nl

Public Domain BGM from OpenGameArt.Org - Bossa Nova by Joth
